unnormalised: Hey, sports buffs! Loved reading about PT Usha. Really inspiring! Remember watching her races as a kid. Anyone read Milkha Singh's bio? Farhan Akhtar did a fab job in "Bhaag Milkha Bhaag," brought his story to life. Makes you proud to be Indian! Maybe a biography on Neeraj Chopra next? He has made Javelin throwing so popular. Kudos to SAI (Sports Authority of India) for their role. What an inspiration for youngsters from Chennai to Kashmir.
